Detailed Description

Cipher that implements AES ECB mode encryption / decryption.

Property Documentation

◆ CipherKeyLen

int IonicSecurity::SDK::AesEcbCipher::CipherKeyLen
staticget

The required length of the AES cipher key.

Returns
The required length of the AES cipher key. Providing a key of any other length will result in an error being returned during any encryption / decryption operation.

◆ KeyBytes

array< System:: Byte>^ IonicSecurity::SDK::AesEcbCipher::KeyBytes
getset

The AES cipher key.

Parameters
[in]mpbyCipherKeyThe key buffer. The key length should always be equal to AesEcbCipher::CipherKeyLen().

◆ KeyHex

String^ IonicSecurity::SDK::AesEcbCipher::KeyHex
set

The AES cipher key from a hex encoded string.

Parameters
[in]mwsCipherKeyHexThe hex key string. The decoded key length should always be equal to AesEcbCipher::CipherKeyLen().
